properties.Name: AssetDiscountedPaybackPeriod
properties.Description:
Discounted Payback is computed by adding the present value of each year's cash inflows until they equal the investment.

DISCOUNTED PAYBACK = (INITIAL CASH OUTLAY/DISCOUNTED ANNUAL CASH INFLOWS)

Columns.Name: AssetId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Asset.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the Asset discounted payback is calculated.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the Asset discounted payback is calculated.

Columns.Name: InitialCashOutlayAmount
Columns.Description: The initial amount of outlay for the Asset.

Columns.Name: DiscountedAnnualCashInflowsAmount
Columns.Description: The discounted annual cash inflows associated with the Asset.

Columns.Name: DiscountedPaybackAmount
Columns.Description: Discounted Payback = (Initial Cash Outlay/Discounted Annual Cash Inflows)

Properties.Description:
Discounted Payback is computed by adding the present value of each year's cash inflows until they equal the investment.

DISCOUNTED PAYBACK = (INITIAL CASH OUTLAY/DISCOUNTED ANNUAL CASH INFLOWS)
